name: The Sea Of Truth
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 45 using Godot in 72 hours.

Instructions:
You're in a strange forest.
To reach the sea of truth,
you will have to find your way to the other side.
But beware, you start with no health and no ability to attack.

Good luck

Movement: W, A, S, D or Arrow-Keys
Attack: Spacebar

This was my first game jam and the first time I ever really used Godot. I suggest playing the Web version, but for some reason it does not seem to load on some devices or shows a black background on others. Please try one of the downloadable builds if this is the case for you. I did not have time to test the Windows version yet.
Sourcecode is available, if you are interested, but it's of course all quite messy... ;)
